title: AI in practice: making mobile apps smarter
summary: This session shows how you, too, can use ML in your mobile application. We describe our journey of building and modifying TensorFlow Lite models, their usage in Android, and how existing libraries can be leveraged to smarten your app up. Come look at the code and see it in action with live demos.
description:
With the number of applications powered by Artificial Intelligence on mobile devices continuously growing (e.g., face identification, photo enhancements), one can't help but wonder: how hard can it be to use AI in one's application?


With this in mind, we set out to discover how to use machine learning models in a mobile application. In the process, we recognised footwear, described scenes, and transformed photographs, among other applications. A book even came out of it!


This session shows how you, too, can use ML in your mobile application. We describe our journey of building and modifying TensorFlow Lite models, their usage in Android, and how existing libraries can be leveraged to smarten your app up. Come look at the code and see it in action with live demos.


Who knows, you may be writing the next AI-powered killer app...
